lines.text:
[to Dr. Palmer]
What you're saying is if I give up living, I'll live!

[to Charley, referring to his marriage]
You've been faithful twenty years? That's a long rap!
Too much tension... it's always coming to bat with the bases loaded.
That'd make you a smarter gambler than I think you are.

[to prostitute]
Unless I hire people, i don't like them workin' here.

[about Charley]
He's a nut when it comes to dignity

[to Charley]
No more drinking, no more smoking. What are you gonna give up next?

[Contemptuously to Robbin as she's playing a slot machine]
How come I attract nothing but lemons.
